trans-unit.source: This class can be used for issuing the symmetric key based token.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別可用於發行對稱金鑰式的權杖。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SymmetricProofDescriptor" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SymmetricProofDescriptor" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptingCredentials" /> to be used.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptingCredentials" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SymmetricProofDescriptor" /> class with the specified encrypting credentials.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的加密簽署認證，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SymmetricProofDescriptor" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor if you want the STS to use the specified <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptingCredentials>.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式，如果您想要使用指定 STS <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptingCredentials>。

trans-unit.source: The symmetric key that is used inside the issued token.
trans-unit.target: 使用於發行的權杖內部的對稱金鑰。

trans-unit.source: The key encrypting credentials for the relying party.
trans-unit.target: 信賴憑證者的金鑰加密憑證。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SymmetricProofDescriptor" /> class with the specified key material.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的金鑰內容，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SymmetricProofDescriptor" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor if you want the STS to use the specified key bytes.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要使用指定的索引鍵位元組 STS，請使用這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: This happens when client sends the entropy, and the STS would just use that as the key for the issued token.
trans-unit.target: 會發生這種情況是當用戶端會傳送 entropy，STS 會只使用，作為核發之權杖的金鑰。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="key" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="key" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The size of the symmetric key.
trans-unit.target: 對稱金鑰的大小。

trans-unit.source: The key encrypting credentials for the target of the request.
trans-unit.target: 要求目標的金鑰加密憑證。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SymmetricProofDescriptor" /> class with an auto-generated key.
trans-unit.target: 使用自動產生的金鑰，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SymmetricProofDescriptor" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor if you want the STS to auto-generate the key using a random number generator and send it in the proof token as a binary secret.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要自動產生索引鍵使用亂數產生器，並將它做為二進位密碼在證明權杖中的 STS，請使用這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The size of the symmetric key.
trans-unit.target: 對稱金鑰的大小。

trans-unit.source: The key encrypting credentials for the target of the request.
trans-unit.target: 要求目標的金鑰加密憑證。

trans-unit.source: The key encrypting credentials for the requestor.
trans-unit.target: 要求者的金鑰加密憑證。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SymmetricProofDescriptor" /> class with an auto-generated key.
trans-unit.target: 使用自動產生的金鑰，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SymmetricProofDescriptor" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor if you want the STS to auto-generate the key and send it in the proof token as encrypted key.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要自動產生金鑰並將它做為加密的索引鍵在證明權杖中的 STS，請使用這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Two cases can be covered by using this constructor:
trans-unit.target: 兩種情況下可以使用這個建構函式涵蓋：

trans-unit.source: The client sends the entropy, but the server rejects it.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端傳送 entropy，但是伺服器會拒絕它。

trans-unit.source: The client does not send the entropy, so the server's entropy is used.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端不會傳送 entropy，因此會使用伺服器的 entropy。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="keySizeInBits" /> is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keySizeInBits" /> 小於或等於零。

trans-unit.source: The size of the symmetric key.
trans-unit.target: 對稱金鑰的大小。

trans-unit.source: The key encrypting credentials for the target of the request.
trans-unit.target: 要求目標的金鑰加密憑證。

trans-unit.source: The encrypting credentials for the requestor used to encrypt the entropy or the proof token.
trans-unit.target: 用來加密 Entropy 或證明權杖的要求者的加密憑證。

trans-unit.source: The requestor's entropy.
trans-unit.target: 要求者的 Entropy。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SymmetricProofDescriptor" /> class to use for sending combined entropy.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SymmetricProofDescriptor" /> 類別的新執行個體，用來傳送合併 Entropy。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor if you want to send a combined entropy.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要傳送組合的 entropy，請使用這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceEntropy" /> is <see langword="null" /> or an empty array.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceEntropy" /> 為 <see langword="null" /> 或是空陣列。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="keySize" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keySize" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: The size of the symmetric key.
trans-unit.target: 對稱金鑰的大小。

trans-unit.source: The key encrypting credentials for the relying party.
trans-unit.target: 信賴憑證者的金鑰加密憑證。

trans-unit.source: The key encrypting credentials for the requestor.
trans-unit.target: 要求者的金鑰加密憑證。

trans-unit.source: The algorithm (URI) specified in the <see langword="<EncryptWith>" /> element of the RST.
trans-unit.target: 在 RST 的 <see langword="<EncryptWith>" /> 項目中指定的演算法 (URI)。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to have the STS autogenerate a key and send it in the proof token as encrypted key.
trans-unit.target: 使用此建構函式讓 STS 自動產生金鑰，並將它放在證明權杖中做為加密的金鑰傳送。

trans-unit.source: Two cases are covered here 1.
trans-unit.target: 這裡涵蓋兩個案例 1.

trans-unit.source: client sends the entropy, but server rejects it 2.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端傳送熵，但伺服器拒絕它 2.

trans-unit.source: client did not send a entropy, so just use server's entropy
trans-unit.target: 用戶端沒有傳送熵，因此只使用伺服器的熵

trans-unit.source: If `encryptWith` is a DES algorithm, the key is guaranteed not to be a weak DES key.
trans-unit.target: 如果`encryptWith`DES 演算法，不保證索引鍵是弱的 DES 金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor if you want the STS to auto-generate the key and send it in the proof token as encrypted key.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要自動產生金鑰並將它做為加密的索引鍵在證明權杖中的 STS，請使用這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Two cases can be covered by using this constructor:
trans-unit.target: 兩種情況下可以使用這個建構函式涵蓋：

trans-unit.source: The client sends the entropy, but the server rejects it.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端傳送 entropy，但是伺服器會拒絕它。

trans-unit.source: The client does not send the entropy, so the server's entropy is used.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端不會傳送 entropy，因此會使用伺服器的 entropy。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="keySizeInBits" /> is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keySizeInBits" /> 小於或等於零。

trans-unit.source: The size of the symmetric key.
trans-unit.target: 對稱金鑰的大小。

trans-unit.source: The encrypting credentials for the relying party used to encrypt the key in the SecurityKeyIdentifier property.
trans-unit.target: 用來加密 [SecurityKeyIdentifier] 屬性中之金鑰的信賴憑證者的加密憑證。

trans-unit.source: The encrypting credentials for the requestor used to encrypt the entropy or the proof token.
trans-unit.target: 用來加密 Entropy 或證明權杖的要求者的加密憑證。

trans-unit.source: The requestor's entropy.
trans-unit.target: 要求者的 Entropy。

trans-unit.source: The URI of the algorithm to use to encrypt the proof key.
trans-unit.target: 用來加密證明金鑰的演算法的 URI。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SymmetricProofDescriptor" /> class to use for sending combined entropy.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SymmetricProofDescriptor" /> 類別的新執行個體，用來傳送合併 Entropy。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to send combined entropy.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個建構函式傳送組合的 entropy。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="keySizeInBits" /> is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keySizeInBits" /> 小於或等於零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceEntropy" /> is <see langword="null" /> or an empty array.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceEntropy" /> 為 <see langword="null" /> 或是空陣列。

trans-unit.source: The RSTR to which to apply the proof descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 要套用證明描述元的 RSTR。

trans-unit.source: Modifies the specified RSTR based on the settings in this proof descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 根據這個證明描述元中的設定，修改指定的 RSTR。

trans-unit.source: Sets the appropriate artifacts, such as the requested proof token, inside the RSTR based on what is inside the proof descriptor instance.
trans-unit.target: 設定適當的成品，例如要求的證明權杖，根據何謂證明描述元執行個體內的 RSTR 內。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="response" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="response" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the key material.
trans-unit.target: 取得金鑰內容。

trans-unit.source: A byte array that contains the key material.
trans-unit.target: 包含金鑰內容的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: Gets the source entropy in plain bytes.
trans-unit.target: 取得來源 Entropy，以純位元組為單位。

trans-unit.source: A byte array that contains the source entropy.
trans-unit.target: 包含來源 Entropy 的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: Gets the target entropy in plain bytes
trans-unit.target: 取得目標 Entropy，以純位元組為單位

trans-unit.source: A byte array that contains the target entropy.
trans-unit.target: 包含目標 Entropy 的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: Gets the key identifier that can be used inside the issued token to define the key.
trans-unit.target: 取得可用於發出權杖內的金鑰識別項，以定義金鑰。

trans-unit.source: It is usually the binary secret or the encrypted key;
trans-unit.target: 它通常是二進位密碼或加密金鑰。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵識別項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the requestor's encrypting credentials, which may be used to encrypt the requested proof token or the entropy in the response.
trans-unit.target: 取得要求者的加密認證，可用來加密回應中要求的證明權杖或 Entropy。

trans-unit.source: The requestor’s encrypting credentials.
trans-unit.target: 要求者的加密憑證。

trans-unit.source: Gets the relying party encrypting credentials, which may be used to encrypt the requested security token in the response.
trans-unit.target: 取得信賴憑證者加密認證，可用來加密回應中要求的安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: The relying party encrypting credentials.
trans-unit.target: 信賴憑證者加密憑證。
